about-us.title: About Us | Grand Residences Riviera Cancun
about-us.description: A guarantee of excellence with luxurious accommodation and delightful amenities. Enter and Book Now!

policies.title: Know our Resort Policies | Grand Residences Riviera Cancun
policies.description: Please review our resort policies. This is an Important information for a pleasant stay. Learn more.

privacy.title: Privacy Statement and Policies | Grand Residences Riviera Cancun
privacy.description: Your privacy is important to us. We are committed to protecting your personal information. Read more.

contact-us.title: Contact Us | Grand Residences Riviera Cancun
contact-us.description: In Grand Residences Riviera Cancun we will glad to assist you with any question or requirement you may have

media-room.title: Grand Residences Riviera Cancun | Media Room
media-room.description: Ideally situated between Cancun and Playa del Carmen, within a half hour from the Cancun International Airport, Grand Residences is a tranquil enclave protected by a coral reef and National Marine Park in the front yard and a nature reserve in the backyard.

chat.label2: Start a chat with an agent
chat.label4: Become part of our mailing list and receive an exclusive coupon code to get an additional 5% discount on all our current offers!

consent.title: OUR USE OF COOKIES
consent.overlay: The personal and/or sensitive information requested is utilized to provide the user with the required service. The privacy of your information is protected under the guidelines of the Privacy Policy of the Company and as mandated by law. The use of this site is subject to unconditional acceptance by the user of the terms and conditions specified in our Privacy Policy.

general.restrict-room: 2 bedroom rooms available only with our vacation experts: CALL NOW (<>)
general.restrict-room-large: Two and Three bedroom suites or Reservations for 6 or more people available only with our vacation experts: CALL NOW (<>)
general.select-area: Select a category to start a chat
general.manage_detail: To view your reservation details, modify or cancel your reservation, please select your resort and enter your confirmation number
general.hotel-no-apply: My Royal additional discounts do not apply in Hotel + Flight package deals

messages.confirm_your_email: We have sent you an email to confirm your email address

general.minlos: The minimum number of nights selected does not apply: 2 nigth-stay minimum required
general.description-transportation: We offer complimentary roundtrip* airport transportation for our guests. In order to schedule this private service, please provide the following information at least 72 hours before your arrival day.
general.condition-transportation: Please be advised that our airport transportation service operates exclusively from Cancun International Airport. Upon confirmation of your reservation, our dedicated team will promptly send you an email with a voucher attached. This voucher must be printed and presented at the time of pickup to validate the service.
general.restriction-transportation: *Restrictions may apply for owner loan, certificates and Discovery.

messages-email.transportation: Your transportation request has been sent successfully
messages-email.error: An error occurred, please try again later

general.message_gms_login:
Maintenance Notice:

The login and registration service for the My Royal program is unavailable today, Saturday, September 28th, due to maintenance work. It will be available again tomorrow, Sunday, September 29th.

We apologize for the inconvenience and invite you to return from that date onward.
